content:
Nin priya sahadenmaarodum ninnude nal kaadeesha maarodum koode
Orkkaname nyangallkkuttullllaa-raam mrthare;
Nin valamaakkittheertthavare
/thaaleluyyaa - modippikka.

Thirusabha makkallkkaayu ninnodettam duഃkhatthaale
Keneedunnevam:
“naathhaa! Maamodeesaayaal ni-nne poondor
Theenarakam pukeedaathe
/thaaleluyyaa-modikkaname.”

1. Karuna niranyavane! Punaruththhaanatthil
Ninnude srshdiye nee puthuthaakkeedaname.

2. Ninnil sharanatthaal nidrayilaayu ninte
Varavinu kaattheedum mrtharil kaniyaname.

4. Vannavanaam varuvonum mrthar thannuyirum
Sthuthanennu shareeraathmaakkall paadaname.
